description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Poor Spooky has been trapped in a mansion full of evil spirits.He must herd them into the correct traps before the timer runs out. Succeed and move one step closer to escape. Fail and you lose a life. Also featuring a bonus level where you must avoid the pumpkins and collect the stars to gain extra lives...Can you reach level 50 !?
description.short: Poor Spooky has been trapped in a mansion full of evil spirits.He must herd them into the correct traps before the timer runs out. Succeed and move one step closer to escape. Fail and you lose a life. Also featuring a bonus level where you must avoid the pumpkins and collect the stars to gain extra lives...Can you reach level 50 !?
